item.title: duma key
item.description: Duma key is a great book about a big accident, a painter and his adventures in the fight versus an unknown super natural phenomenom.

item.title: Good to great book review
item.description: I read Good to Great in January 2016. An awesome read sharing detailed analysis on how good companies became great. Although this book is about how companies became great but we could apply a lot of the learnings on ourselves. Concepts like level 5 leader, hedgehog concept, the stockdale paradox are equally applicable to individuals.
